availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Willis D. Sizemore (Clay County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer. Clay County, Kentucky, native. Son of Henry Sizemore and Rachel Sizemore. Married to Arra Roberts Sizemore in Clay County, Kentucky, on January 19, 1852. Father of Rachel Sizemore, Thomas Sizemore, Henry Sizemore, Robert Sizemore, Abijah Sizemore, and Mary Sizemore. Resident of Clay County in 1850. Farmer in Clay County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Kentucky, p. 122A.

Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Asher, District 026, p. 556D.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994031, Clay County Marriages.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY Roll 994032, Clay County Births.
